summary: Adds 3 summonable spectral horses you can ride.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 3 summonable spectral horses you can ride. They are essential and invulnerable, Yes ride off the highest cliff you can find and they don't care, some idiot attacks your mount while riding they wont care.. They can be summoned anywhere except while swimming, yes you can summon one in your home if you want. They come in 3 colors, red, blue, and purple. They are set at level 999 with 6k+ stamina, they should run for a long time before running out.

The spell tomes can be bought or stolen from Riverwood Traders. Price is 10,000 each.

Started this last night after trying to summon Arvak in Bruma, decided to make a new version of him without summon restrictions and thats the purple one... then decided to make a couple more colors for the hell of it.

Skyrim SE version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11808/?] Spectral Horses [/url]

Mod Authors:

This is a mod resource. Feel free to use in your mod, just give proper credits. Letting me know you used it is apreciated.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Versions and update info:[/size][/color][/b]

V1.0 Initial release

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Compatibility and required files:[/size][/color][/b]

Requires:
Dawnguard.

May be incompatible with anything that changes Riverwood Traders or the vendor chest.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/b]

Use NMM.

Manual for individual files:
1. Unzip/unrar to any location.
2. Copy the extracted contents into your Data folder.
3. Add the esp to your load order.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Mod Use Permission: [/size][/color][/b]

Free to use in your mod.
Credits must be given.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Credits: [/size][/color][/b]

Bethesda.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]My other mods....[/size][/color][/b]
